scripts.database:migrate:dev: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $EXTERNAL_POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate
scripts.database:pull:dev: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $EXTERNAL_POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npx prisma db pull
scripts.database:push:dev: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $EXTERNAL_POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.seed:all: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $EXTERNAL_POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npm run seed:all
scripts.seed:undo:all: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $EXTERNAL_POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npm run seed:undo:all
scripts.seed:redo:all: export POSTGRES_URL=$(docker compose --env-file=.env.dev exec backend sh -c 'echo $EXTERNAL_POSTGRES_URL') && cd backend && npm run seed:undo:all && npm run seed:all
scripts.start: docker compose --env-file=.env.dev up -d && npm run database:migrate:dev
